element.name: decimater_decimate

input.name: decimater_type
input.long: Select the Type of the Decimater, 0 (incremental), 1(MC), 2(Mixed)

input.name: random_samples
input.short: Number of samples for the MC Decimater.
input.long: Specifies the number of samples for the MC decimater. This parameter is used by the MC and Mixed Decimater.

input.name: incremental_percentage
input.long: Percentage of the workload for the Incremental Decimater. Only used by the Mixed Decimater

input.name: decimation_order
input.long: Decimation Order: 0 (by Distance), 1 (by Normal Deviation), and 2 (by Edge Length)
